title: Chilli and lemongrass glazed tuna steak with asparagus salad
description: This sticky glaze is easy to make and turns a quickly griddled tuna steak into a zingy meal for two. Try it with asparagus and root veg salad.
ingredients: ½ bunch baby breakfast radishes, leaves removed and reserved
2 tbsp fresh mint leaves, left whole
2 tbsp baby coriander cress, to serve
